data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: South Africa has extreme differences in incomes and wealth. The ____ level ____ economic ____ in ____ post-apartheid ____ has ____ to a measurable ____ in ____ poverty, but ____ has ____. Inequality between urban and rural areas is changing: while rural poverty rates remain substantially higher than those in urban areas, urban poverty rates are rising and rural rates seem to be falling.
data.partBlankContent: South Africa has extreme differences in incomes and wealth. The go__ level o_ economic gro___ in t__ post-apartheid per___ has l__ to a measurable dec____ in inc___ poverty, but inequ_____ has incr_____. Inequality between urban and rural areas is changing: while rural poverty rates remain substantially higher than those in urban areas, urban poverty rates are rising and rural rates seem to be falling.
data.answer: 南非在收入和财富方面存在巨大差异。后种族隔离时期良好的经济增长水平导致了收入贫困的明显下降，但不平等却加剧了。城市和农村地区之间的不平等正在改变:虽然农村地区的贫困率仍然大大高于城市地区，但城市贫困率正在上升，农村地区的贫困率似乎正在下降。
